name: Modern
description: Contemporary design with bold typography and clean lines

sections.title: Professional Summary
sections.content: Results-driven marketing professional with 5+ years of experience in digital marketing and brand strategy. Proven track record of increasing brand awareness by 40% and driving 25% growth in customer engagement through innovative campaigns and data-driven approaches.

jobs.title: Senior Marketing Manager
bullets: Led digital marketing campaigns resulting in 40% increase in brand awareness
Managed team of 5 marketing specialists and coordinated with cross-functional teams
Implemented data-driven strategies that improved conversion rates by 25%
Developed and executed social media campaigns across multiple platforms

jobs.title: Marketing Specialist
bullets: Created and managed content marketing strategies for 15+ clients
Increased client social media engagement by 35% through targeted campaigns
Conducted market research and competitor analysis to inform strategy
Collaborated with design team to create compelling visual content
